title: Fixing autofill
body:
Just a thought.
If you get auto filled you should be given a slot where you get a ban.
So often when I get auto filled I also get given one of the top two slots it give you no feeling of agency in the select screen.

replies.body:
Eventually there will be 5 bans per match, 1 for each player.

It's coming as soon as the new client goes out of beta. I think.

Autofill is garbage

Lethality is garbage

Season 7 fast becoming garbage aswell
